TopicTitle: Red and blue streaks in game ?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

 I am seeing at time, red streaks. basically a red line coming out form a pod in re-entry, or even when chute is open... also, I see blue streaks coming out the side of the rocket on launch when it rotates or tilts during take off.... is this a mod glitch, how do I get rid of it, it is annoying......?
Those are forces lines. Hit f11 to disable them.
Really? Wow, I am a bottle rocketeer aint I.. Thanks -
No problem. Everyone has to start somewhere. If you need anything else, just PM me.

> 
> Those are forces lines. Hit f11 to disable them.

F12 by default.

F12 toggles the aerodynamic indicators. Red lines represent drag. Blue and yellow lift (yellow from control surfaces).

F11 toggles a thermal display which makes every part glow depending on it temperature. It's a bit scary at first as it all looks red hot, but don't panic it's normal.

F10 toggles little temperature gauges that appear when parts are starting to get a bit too warm.

All these are quite handy, but can be a bit obtrusive, but they are easy to toggle on and off.
